strategy_reasoning: OpenClaw is a technical update (AI agents), but to make it fit our 'cozy' brand, we're visualizing it as a friendly robotic companion entering our digital garden. The 'one-command setup' translates visually to a magic spell or instant growth moment, keeping the vibe accessible and low-stress rather than technical and intimidating.
